body:
http://www.sporcle.com/games/g/world
http://www.sporcle.com/games/g/worldwater
http://www.sporcle.com/games/g/worldflags


These are three quizzes from a trivia website that I am a member of. My challenge is if you can get 100% correct on all three without using Google, an atlas, etc. When done, reply with a post that says "Complete." Enjoy, guys. :)
